greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest prime divisor of the Fibonacci numbers > 1.
comment: Fibonacci number > 1, divided by its largest proper divisor.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1406 (terms 1..200 Vincenzo Librandi)
maple: with(numtheory): with(combinat): a:=proc(n) options operator, arrow: op(2, divisors(fibonacci(n))) end proc: seq(a(n),n=3..60); # _Emeric Deutsch_, May 02 2008
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Apr 23 2008
ext: More terms from _Emeric Deutsch_ and _Harvey P. Dale_, May 02 2008
